thread.title: Sprint shares plummet on T-Mobile deal worry

title: Sprint shares plummet on T-Mobile deal worry
text:
Sprint shares plummet on T-Mobile deal worry 01:32
Shares of Sprint Corp (S.N) fell 13 percent on Monday after the telecom company agreed to a $26 billion all-stock deal with rival T-Mobile US Inc TMUS.N that faces antitrust hurdles and is seen as less favorable than an earlier offer, analysts said. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Shares of Sprint Corp (S.N) fell 13 percent on Monday after the telecom company agreed to a $26 billion all-stock deal with rival T-Mobile US Inc TMUS.N that faces antitrust hurdles and is seen as less favorable than an earlier offer, analysts said.
